Source Adventurer's Armory 2 pg. 9

Statistics

Cost 5 gp Weight 2 lbs.

Damage 1d4 (small), 1d6 (medium); Critical 18-20/x2; Range -; Type P or S; Special monk, see text

Category Light; Proficiency Exotic

Weapon Groups Close

Description

Also known as a "scorpion's tail" due to its unique, stinger-like shape, this short, double-curved blade has no hilt but features a knuckle guard. You gain a +2 bonus to your CMD against disarm attempts made to disarm you of a waveblade.
